title: GPS Jamming Attack Response
description: An operator of a drone reports that they are losing their GPS signal due to suspected enemy jamming.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the GPS interference report from the drone.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator confirms receipt of the report.

tasks.description: Task a signals intelligence asset to scan the area for the source of the jamming signal.
tasks.expected_outcome: A SIGINT aircraft detects and locates the position of the GPS jammer.

tasks.description: Task an artillery unit to destroy the identified jammer, eliminating the threat to friendly assets.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator successfully coordinates a kinetic strike to neutralize the electronic warfare threat.
